com.lukflug.panelstudio.component

Class PopupComponent<T extends IComponent>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.component.ComponentProxy<T>
      • com.lukflug.panelstudio.component.FixedComponent<T>
        • com.lukflug.panelstudio.component.PopupComponent<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the component type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComponent, IComponentProxy<T>, IFixedComponent, IPopup

    public class PopupComponent<T extends IComponent>
extends FixedComponent<T>
    A FixedComponent that uses dynamic IPopupPositioner for positioning.
